articles.author: Russell Falcon
articles.title: People threaten to call ICE on staff of Houston Mexican restaurant after choice to keep mask requirement - KXAN.com
articles.description: Earlier this week, Texas Governor Greg Abbott announced the end of the state’s mask mandate — the decision was met with acclaim from some and condemnation from others.
